attributes.review: It’s so ridiculous how bad this app is I can’t even put it into whether it’s truly hate it. It gave me viruses on my iPhone which is a brand new phone and I was very disappointed. It takes about an hour to download and when I open the app everything takes about 20 minutes to load up which is ridiculous.Aside from being slow it doesn’t allow me to make choices on what I want to see it and instead face me with nothing but ads. I can say nothing more than I hate this app.
attributes.title: ITS HORRIBLE

attributes.review:
SHREK
                         Once upon a time there was a lovely 
                         princess. But she had an enchantment 
                         upon her of a fearful sort which could 
                         only be broken by love's first kiss. 
                         She was locked away in a castle guarded 
                         by a terrible fire-breathing dragon. 
                         Many brave knights had attempted to 
                         free her from this dreadful prison, 
                         but non prevailed. She waited in the 
                         dragon's keep in the highest room of 
                         the tallest tower for her true love 
                         and true love's first kiss. (laughs) 
                         Like that's ever gonna happen. What 
                         a load of - (toilet flush)
 
               Allstar - by Smashmouth begins to play. Shrek goes about his 
               day. While in a nearby town, the villagers get together to go 
               after the ogre.
 
               NIGHT - NEAR SHREK'S HOME

                                     MAN1
                         Think it's in there?

                                     MAN2
                         All right. Let's get it!

                                     MAN1
                         Whoa. Hold on. Do you know what that 
                         thing can do to you?
 
                                     MAN3
                         Yeah, it'll grind your bones for it's 
                         bread.
 
               Shrek sneaks up behind them and laughs.

                                     SHREK
                         Yes, well, actually, that would be a 
                         giant. Now, ogres, oh they're much worse. 
                         They'll make a suit from your freshly 
                         peeled skin.
 
                                     MEN
                         No!

                                     SHREK
                         They'll shave your liver. Squeeze the 
                         jelly from your eyes! Actually, it's 
                         quite good on toast.
 
                                     MAN1
                         Back! Back, beast! Back! I warn ya! 
                         (waves the torch at Shrek.)
 
               Shrek calmly licks his fingers and extinguishes the torch. The 
               men shrink back away from him. Shrek roars very loudly and long 
               and his breath extinguishes all the remaining torches until the 
               men are in the dark.
 
                                     SHREK
                         This is the part where you run away. 
                         (The men scramble to get away. He laughs.) 
                         And stay out! (looks down and picks 
                         up a piece of paper. Reads.) "Wanted. 
                         Fairy tale creatures."(He sighs and 
                         throws the paper over his shoulder.)
 
                         
               THE NEXT DAY

               There is a line of fairy tale creatures. The head of the guard 
               sits at a table paying people for bringing the fairy tale creatures 
               to him. There are cages all around. Some of the people in line 
               are Peter Pan, who is carrying Tinkerbell in a cage, Gipetto 
               who's carrying Pinocchio, and a farmer who is carrying the three 
               little pigs.
 
                                     GUARD
                         All right. This one's full. Take it 
                         away! Move it along. Come
attributes.title: Took too long to download so I watched the movie shrek

attributes.review: My friend and I wanted to keep up to date on our wonderful president and the moment we did we got a text from a random number. The text read “if you don’t vote for Trump and don’t stop ruining his rallies we will hunt you down kidnap you and steal all your Robux- trump💕” so we got scared and told everyone of our breakfast club to vote for trump. But about a few weeks later my friend hit me up and said the FBI was at her door. So I toke my razor scooter a sped over to her crib to only find her... not their so what did I do? I caught the next flight to DC and where was my friend... cutting the lawn of the white house and being used as Donald trumps personal slave. Before I went to help her I thought why this happened and then I remember we never told our sixth-grade history teacher to vote for trump. It was all my fault he was on my list and I forgot because I was too busy cleaning my 2002 jeep, but I couldn’t think about that now I needed to save my friend. So I parkoured over the fence and used my Taekwondo skills to fight off the secret service but there were too many of them so a 92-year-old women helped me by hitting them with her cane till we finally saved my friend. After that, we toke a plane back home and delete the trump 2020 app. So please do not get this app it will only hurt you. One star in my option must be a glitch or something going on with it.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD OR ELSE YOU WILL BE KIDNAPPED

attributes.review: Omfg this app wiped my whole phone all my apps where gone when it downloaded
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD!!!!!!!!!!!

attributes.review: So laggy!! Couldn’t get ANYTHING to work. It’s a shame that it didn’t work, probably a fun game, but I wouldn’t know bc it doesn’t load. But it looks like everyone is having a similar problem. And when I downloaded it, it gave me an email and told me multiple slurs and bad names. And they said they were gonna dox me! Wouldn’t recommend
